briefTitle: Monitoring COVID-19 Vaccination Response in Fragile Populations
officialTitle: "Multicenter Observational Study to Assess the Incidence and Features of COVID-19 and the Response to COVID-19 Vaccination in Fragile Patients"

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Any age
* Any comorbidity
* Person (or attorney or deputy who has been authorized to make the decision for patients who lack capacity) consent to participate or appropriate local waiver of consent.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients did not agree to participate

primary.measure: Early immune response to COVID-19 vaccine patients
primary.description: To investigate the early immune response to COVID-19 vaccine in fragile patients assessing the levels of antibodies against Spike antigens and the patterns of cellular immune response

primary.measure: Late immune response to COVID-19 vaccine
primary.description: To investigate the late immune response to COVID-19 vaccine in fragile patients assessing the levels of antibodies against Spike antigens and the patterns of cellular immune response
To investigate the rate of COVID-19 breakthrough infections in fragile patients within 1 year after vaccination onset

primary.measure: Rate of hospital admission for COVID-19 breakthrough infections condition and its impact on the outcome in fragile patients
primary.description: To investigate the rate of hospital admission for COVID-19 breakthrough infections in fragile patients

primary.measure: Rate of death for COVID-19 breakthrough infections patients
primary.description: To investigate the rate of death for COVID-19 breakthrough infections in fragile patients
